Package fr.cnrs.iees.omhtk

Interface WriteProtectable

public interface WriteProtectable
An interface for objects that can be write protected / write enabled. It is similar to Sealable except the seal is reversible
Author:
J. Gignoux - 13 f√©vr. 2017

    Method
    Description

    isReadOnly()
    Whether this instance is writeable.
    WriteProtectable

    WriteProtectable
    writeEnable()
    Enables data writing in this instance.

  • Method Details

    • isReadOnly

      boolean isReadOnly()
      Whether this instance is writeable.
      Returns:
      true if data is write-protected, false if writing is permitted

    • writeEnable

      WriteProtectable writeEnable()
      Enables data writing in this instance.
      Returns:
      this instance for agile programming

    • writeDisable

      WriteProtectable writeDisable()
      Disables data writing in this instance.
      Returns:
      this instance for agile programming
